item.title: Game Design Document Format for Academic Purposes
item.description: Opening Page The cover page contains information including: Title. The title in the form of the words “Game Design Document” is needed to name the document so that at a glance people can imply what is meant in the document. Game Title. In the form of an attachment to the game name either in the form of a logo or any form that can be read. Genre and Game Mode. Contains information about the genre and game mode—such as online or offline mode, and single-player or multi-player mode—that will be used.
